item.title: Flinker Support Plans – Schedule A (V1)
item.description:
Version: v2026-02 Effective date: 2026-01-26
Back to latest Download PDF Print

Table of Contents

  1. Purpose and structure
  2. Support Plans overview
  3. Definitions
  4. Scope of support (Reactive L2/L3)
  5. Customer responsibilities (SLA preconditions)
  6. Support intake, channels, and case handling
  7. Severity levels (P1–P4)
  8. Service level targets (SLA)
  9. Fair use and capacity controls (V1)
  10. Success Hours (Advisory / Enablement)
  11. Escalation and post-incident review (V1)
  12. Term, renewal, and changes
  13. Order of precedence
  14. Miscellaneous

This Schedule A defines the scope, service levels, and operating rules for Flinker support plans (“Support Plans”). It supplements the Flinker Services Terms (the “Master Terms”). Capitalized terms not defined here have the meaning set out in the Master Terms.
